hint: Focus on pushing filters early into CTEs and converting implicit joins to explicit joins for better plan control. Minimize restructuring while improving predicate selectivity.
Isolate date and dimension filters into materialized CTEs before joining to the fact table. Restructure with explicit joins while keeping overall query shape similar.
Materialize all filtered dimensions and fact subsets separately, then join. Consider restructuring as multiple CTEs with strategic materialization for plan stability.
Transform query structure by separating filtering and aggregation phases. Experiment with CTE decomposition patterns that change the join order and aggregation timing.
